text: wala tade -ayha alrswl- min dun allah shyyana min al'awthan walasnam; li'anaha laa tanfae wala tdrru, fa'iin fealt dhlk wdewtha min dun allah fa'iinak 'idhana min almushrikin ballh, alzaalimin lanfshm balshrk walmesy. whdha wa'iin kan khtabana llrswl salaa allah ealayh wsllam fa'iinah mwjjah lemwm alamt
